Electric toothbrush with built-in AI technology: Develop an electric toothbrush with built-in AI technology that can detect the user's brushing technique and provide real-time feedback on how to improve their brushing habits. The toothbrush could also track the user's brushing history and provide personalized recommendations for improving oral hygiene.

Interactive electric toothbrush with gamification: Create an electric toothbrush that gamifies the brushing experience by incorporating fun and engaging features such as games, quizzes, and rewards. This could motivate users to brush their teeth for the full recommended 2 minutes and make the experience more enjoyable.

Personalized electric toothbrush with customizable bristles: Design an electric toothbrush with interchangeable bristles that can be customized to suit the user's specific oral health needs. For example, some bristles could be gentler for sensitive teeth and gums, while others could be more aggressive for removing plaque and tartar.

Smart electric toothbrush with breath analysis: Develop an electric toothbrush that includes a built-in breath analysis feature that can detect signs of oral health issues such as gum disease, cavities, or bad breath. The toothbrush could provide personalized recommendations for improving oral hygiene based on the user's breath analysis results.

Portable electric toothbrush with built-in charging case: Create an electric toothbrush that comes with a compact, portable charging case that can be easily carried in a purse or backpack. This would make it easy for users to brush their teeth on the go, without worrying about running out of battery power.
